acceptance-test-run.title: Verify the api gives response as per the request parameters
acceptance-test-run.name: Verify the api gives response as per the request parameters

user-story.name: As a End user of the api I want to verify the json response

tag.name: As a End user of the api I want to verify the json response

row.value: 2__6__et fugit eligendi deleniti quidem qui sint nihil autem__Presley.Mueller@myrl.com

test-group.name: [1] {httpRequest=Api_Url, resource=comments, input_fields=postId, input_values=1, expected_fields=postId__id__name__email, expected_values=1__1__id labore ex et quam laborum__Eliseo@gardner.biz, field=postId, expValue=5}
When I send http query request using Api_Url comments and postId as 1

test-step.description: Send http request: https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com, comments, postId, 1
Then I validate postId__id__name__email values as 1__1__id labore ex et quam laborum__Eliseo@gardner.biz in response of webservice
And I count postId occurrence in response of webservice as 5

test-step.description: Send http request: https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com, comments, postId, 2
